name: Cataphract

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 25%.

skills.name: Sure Strike
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff on the target for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Fortify
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Helmcleaver
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will Ignore DEF if the target has less than 50% HP. Damage increases according to this Champion's MAX HP.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
